name: AI-Voice-assistant (kaymen99)
description: [项目级] AI Voice Assistant: Talk to an AI agent that helps you with event scheduling, contact management, accessing your knowledge base, and web searches using simple voice commands。来源: https://github.com/kaymen99/AI-Voice-assistant

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
AI Voice Assistant: Talk to an AI agent that helps you with event scheduling, contact management, accessing your knowledge base, and web searches using simple voice commands

来源: https://github.com/kaymen99/AI-Voice-assistant
语言: Python
Stars: 65

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
README.md
main.py
requirements.txt
scripts
scripts/create_index.py
scripts/fetch_index.py
src
src/agents
src/prompts
src/speech_processing
src/tools
src/utils.py

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Speech-to-Text (STT)**: Convert spoken language into written text.

- **Text-to-Speech (TTS)**: Generate vocal responses from text input.

- **Vocal Interaction**: Engage in natural conversations with the AI assistant.

- **Tool Integration**: Utilize built-in tools for calendar management, contact handling, email composition, web searching, and personal knowledge base access.
